description: A file with .vpk extension is a compressed archive package file that is used to install third-party apps on Sony PlayStation Vita gaming console. These files can be installed only on jailbreak Vita PlayStation by HENkaku that enabled the PS Vita and PSTV to use customized user created content. A VPK archive file contains all the contents that make up the game including images such as PNG files, setting files such as .bin, and any configurations in XML file format.
